resources.string:
1-This app enables you to record video and audio without shutter sound and screen preview.

 2-you can record video and audio secretively.

 3-This app enables you to capture video in high and low quality as per need.

 4-You can use front camera also for recording.

 5-You can start any recording(e.g audio and video) and can lock the device.It will continue recording untill you stop it.

 6- You can also take picture by using app camera without shutter sound.
